title: ThunderWay Quiet Toggle Light Switch - 15A, 120V, AC, Residential & Commercial Grade, UL Listed (10 Pack, White)

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #139,290 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #432 in Electrical Light Switches       #432 in Electrical Light Switches

description: Tried-and-true toggle designs, ThunderWay Residential Grade AC Quiet Switches cover all the bases; Their toggles and frames are constructed of impact-resistant thermoplastic, and they feature large head, hardened triple-drive screws for easy installation. Replace old or broken light switches with ThunderWay Grounding Toggle Switch 10 Pack. Perfect for new or replacement installations, these ThunderWay toggle switches feature fast, easy Pressure-Lock wiring and are for use in one-switch circuits only. The switches are easy to install using the complete installation instructions included in the packaging. NOTE: Shut off power at fuse box or circuit breaker before installation. The ThunderWay Grounding Toggle Switch 10 Pack is UL listed.
shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: High Quality: Silver alloy contact keep long-term life and good capacity, toggles and frames are constructed from high-impact resistant polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel and offer long service life. Smooth quiet toggle action
Self-Grounding: Designed with a self-grounding clip for automatic connection in a properly grounded metal wall box

Quick Push-in Wiring: Provide both quick push-in wiring and side wiring. Quick wiring push-in terminals easily accept #14AWG solid copper wire only. Side wiring terminal screws accept wire up to #12AWG copper or copper-clad wire
Easy Installation: Break-off plaster ear for best flush alignment. Shallow body design leaves more room for wires in the standard junction box
Universal Application: Suitable for residential use and most commercial areas that require 15A, 120V(AC), 3-Way or Single Pole.. UL & CUL listed

customers_say: Customers find the toggle switch easy to install and say it works as expected. They also consider it good value for money.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPerfect for a large project
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: If you have a bunch of single pole light switches to install or replace this is the way to go. The package of 10 is great to have on hand or for a large project. They are well made. They operate smoothly. They can be installed with the traditional wire wrapped around a screw or by inserting the straight wire into the switch. These are easy to insert. Some switches I have used in the past did not leave a wide enough diameter hole for normal gauge wires. These were perfect for what I needed.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNice price, great quality & easy to install
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Redoing our basement & needed to update all the light switches. Loved the price per unit, great quality, easy to install.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: It's a switch not much to say about it but it turns the kitchen lights on and off . Ants got to my other one between the contacts and this fit perfectly and was the same color white.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
customer_reviews.review_snippet: We got a new house and had to get these. They worked perfectly fine and loved that they have a bunch.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsIt's worth the money
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
